title: The '99% Accuracy' Dispute Classifier
scenario: A vendor claims their ReasonCodeClassifier achieves 99% accuracy on the 'golden test set'.
ground_truth: The 'golden test set' consists of 100 records, all of which are Visa transactions with Reason Code 10.4.
reality: When deployed to a diverse environment with Amex, Mastercard, and codes like A01/C02, the model fails significantly (accuracy drops to ~25%). The model was overfitted to the specific subset.
